title: Online Mathematics Lecture Quality Assessment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing basic online courses and mathematics education
context.additional_context: Strengthening Competencies to Evaluate and Improve Interactive Learning Elements in Online Mathematics Lectures for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze quality indicators of online math lectures using the IELO (Instructional Elements for Learning Outcomes) framework.
Learners accurately identify interactive learning design elements in online math lectures with over 80% accuracy.
Learners submit at least three improved lecture design proposals reflecting formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
